pages.text: Found where the stones shift, Chimerite is used in spells that require a great deal of alternation or illusion.
Found in the deepest depths or on the highest peaks, Topaz is commonly used as an entry level magical crystal.
Found relatively common in most layers of the world, Vinteum Dust quickly proved itself a viable magical resource.
Rarely found in meteorites that crashed upon the world a long time ago, Moonstone is a celestial material with extraordinary magical powers.
Sunstone gems were formed over thousands of years inside patches of obsidian touching the nether's lava oceans. Despite this, they are not fire-resistant, and great care must be taken to obtain them.
